title: Should perma banned account get a second chance to improve???
body:
i think they need a second chance just my opinion people can get hard time while play league, ive been there 
but just because someone had a bad day or flamed one game doesnt mean they act like that all the time.
I know riot have  4 punishment tiers i dont want talk about them since we all know what they are, but instead of perma baning people
riot needs perma ban people but not forever but like along amount of time so the person can learn from their mistakes and improve when they get their
account back its just sad when they perma ban someone forever like did he deserve kind of but does he deserve to get banned forever hell nah this
person is a member of the community and deserve to be punished along period of time but not forever ...

replies.body: What do you call the **at least** one prior chance (14 day ban), in most cases two chat restrictions, and in many cases more than just those 3 "second" chances?
I mean, they tried giving permabans another chance in the past. The results were like 95% went right back to doing the same thing that got them banned again.
The 14 day ban WAS the "last chance."

Good news for you, the perma ban only lasts until 2222 or something like this.
So I guess you got what you asked for. 
A pretty liong ban that isn't permanent.
second chance after they get perma ban thats what i meant
people who didnt learn after the first ban wont learn after the second ban, so na.
No they got a lot of chances.
well last chance for them to try and improve you are not them they might feel different most of them reformed but didnt get their account bak
